title: Bug 109718 - Tips show large content in one line instead of the given format
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR THE USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put the mouse on the text item.

Expected Result: The tips should show the content in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips shows the content in one line.
OB: When putting a large content in a text item and saving it, the tips shows the content in one line.
EB: The tips should show the content in the given format instead of in one line.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the text item where you want to put a large content.
3. Put a large content in the text item.
4. Save the text item.
5. Put the mouse on the text item.
